mapper.select:
select t.*, rownum from ( select rp.rvp_spname, r.rv_content, r.rv_star, r.rv_like, oi.m_id from review r, review_photo rp, pay p, final_order fo, orderinfo oi where r.rv_code=rp.rv_code and r.p_code=p.p_code and p.fo_code=fo.fo_code and fo.o_code=oi.o_code order by rv_date desc ) t
where rownum<=6
select g_spname from (select t.*, rownum as rn from (select g_spname, g_date from goods order by g_date desc) t) where rn<=6
